description: A Dart source file defining a configuration class for accessing environment variables, specifically for managing the OpenAI API key in a Flutter project.

classes.name: Config
classes.description: A class providing static methods to access the OpenAI API key from environment variables and to check its availability.

methods.name: openaiApiKey
methods.description: Retrieves the OpenAI API key from environment variables, returning null if not set.

methods.name: hasOpenAIApiKey
methods.description: Checks whether a valid (non-empty) OpenAI API key is set.
